Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory616.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.8', 4: '0.8', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}

{3: "Under the human commandant's leadership, the villagers, having launched a surprise attack against the Temple's forces, manage to repel them and capture both the priestess and the intended sacrifice for this ritual."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}

{3: "Meanwhile, Lamia finds herself in a desperate battle. This isn't realityâ€”there is no way for her to get help from the human commandant here. The notion of fighting together reveals itself as a hollow promise..."}
{3: 'Fighting through the excruciating pain and suppressing her urge to flee, Lamia takes one last glance at those on the beach before gritting her teeth and throwing herself back into battle.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Begonia pushes through the crowd, ignoring the priestess' venomous glare while walking straight to the little Lamia."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Begonia', 3: 'Is there any way you can help Lamia?', 4: '101', 18: '100003910', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: 'Little Lamia', 3: "There's nothing I can do, Begonia.", 4: '102', 18: '100003911', 19: '2', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{3: 'Little Lamia lowers her head just slightly, her eyes void of emotions but her fists clenched tighter.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Little Lamia', 3: 'The one who made those wishes was Lamia, the one who answered was Lamia, the one who took was Lamia, and the one who sacrificed was Lamia, too.', 4: '101', 18: '100003912', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: 'Little Lamia', 3: 'One cannot win and lose at the same time.', 4: '101', 18: '100003913', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: 'But one can learn to overcome oneself.', 3: '27'}
{2: 'Little Lamia', 3: 'People can do that, but not Lamia.', 4: '101', 18: '100003914', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{3: 'Little Lamia looks up, her eyes fixed on the commandant.'}

{2: 'Little Lamia', 3: "Lamia's never going to get better because she only wants to run away when things get too challenging. It's not the most honorable thing to do... but it works.", 4: '101', 18: '100003915', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{3: 'The commandant smiles gently and reaches out to pat Little Lamia on the head.'}
{2: "Guess it's gonna take some time, then.", 3: '37'}
{2: 'Growing up means facing challenges head-on even when you want to run away.', 3: '38'}
{2: "When you're a grown-up, Lamia, I'm sure that's what you're gonna be.", 3: '39'}
{2: "Evacuate everyone from the beach into the city where it's safe.", 3: '44'}
{2: 'Lamia and I will buy you some time.', 3: '46'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'With it, the human commandant sprints straight toward the biggest fishing boat on the shore without looking back.'}
